A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have NO idea how the audience score on this is so low. As I was walking out of the theater besides being consumed with thoughts of the events and characters\, I was already thinking about when I could get back to see it again- something I almost never do. The characters were beautifully human\, and as their relationships developed and unfolded\, their deeper stories became visible. There was nuance\, maturity\, and electricity in this film that I have never seen matched in a previous episode of SW. I loved this movie and will probably buy it - again\, something I never do.
